hackathon-description-text: Space Apps Next Gen is the first two-day high school space hackathon where teams of diverse populations of students from the Greater New York City Area will learn, collaborate, and engage with publicly available data to solve real world scientific challenges. The event will bring together and expose 150+ students to the powerful fusion of data and programming with science, tapping their potential to solve the problems of tomorrow.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Experience with Top Space and Science Organizations

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=150 Broadway, New York, NY 10038, USA
hackathon-description-header: Space Apps Next Gen is the first two-day high school hackathon for engaging with publicly available data to solve real world scientific challenges.
